ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bundt Cake Redux
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Foraged by classes with high forage skills (ie higher than bards.)  So you have to go to Field of Bone and try to get one from folks who can forage them.
ygData.messageBody:
>
Foraged by classes with high forage skills (ie higher than bards.) So you
have to go to Field of Bone and try to get one from folks who can forage
them. A couple rangers in my guild have gotten them and promised to save
'em for me next time. I have not had time to go there myself and auction.
>

Well, I am told that what you forage in the field of bone is actually just a
plain old Bunt Cake, whereas you need to mix that along with something else
in the oven in Droga to get a Burynai Bunt Cake. Has anyone found the recipe
of what you need to mix the bunt cake with to make the burynai cake?

Tszaaz
